pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get and Modify 'oTree' Data // Efficiently manage and process data from 'oTree' experiments. Import 'oTree' data and clean them by using functions that handle messy data, dropouts, and other problematic cases. Create IDs, calculate the time, transfer variables between app data frames, and delete sensitive information. Review your experimental data prior to running the experiment and automatically generate a detailed summary of the variables used in your 'oTree' code. Information on 'oTree' is found in Chen, D. L., Schonger, M., Wickens, C. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jbef.2015.12.001.
